name: Beatbox Burglar
description:
BeatBox Burglar is a Rhythm Stealth game where the player has to navigate through a museum stealing priceless paintings and avoiding guards all while sticking to the beat.

Credits:
Andrew Hunt - Programming
Bryn Hooper - Artist
Michael St. Louis - Sound, Programming
